replies.author: paopaocui泡泡
replies.txt_content:
额。。。。  给你个代码。
@echo OFF
color 2
title 基友服
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
CD /D "%BINDIR%"
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar mc.jar -nojline
PAUSE



你要把你的服务端改成mc.jar
